title: Set Fire to the Rain
author: Adele
lyrics:
[00:08.85] I let it fall, my heart
[00:12.74] And as it fell, you rose to claim it
[00:17.62] It was dark and I was over
[00:21.65] Until you kissed my lips and you saved me
[00:26.40] My hands, they were strong
[00:30.58] But my knees were far too weak
[00:35.46] To stand in your arms
[00:39.58] Without falling to your feet
[00:43.64] But there's a side to you
[00:46.49] That I never knew, never knew
[00:48.62] All the things you'd say
[00:50.66] They were never true, never true
[00:52.97] And the games you'd play
[00:55.22] You would always win, always win
[00:58.86] But I set fire to the rain
[01:03.85] Watched it pour as I touched your face
[01:08.13] Well, it burned while I cried
[01:10.49] 'Cause I heard it screaming out your name
[01:15.05] Your name
[01:17.69] When laying with you
[01:21.52] I could stay there
[01:24.04] Close my eyes, feel you here forever
[01:30.48] You and me together, nothing is better
[01:34.75] 'Cause there's a side to you
[01:37.34] That I never knew, never knew
[01:39.63] All the things you'd say
[01:41.98] They were never true, never true
[01:44.25] And the games you'd play
[01:46.25] You would always win, always win
[01:49.97] But I set fire to the rain
[01:54.72] Watched it pour as I touched your face
[01:59.11] Well, it burned while I cried
[02:01.51] 'Cause I heard it screaming out your name
[02:06.44] Your name
[02:08.26] I set fire to the rain
[02:12.52] And I threw us into the flames
[02:17.13] When we fell, something died
[02:19.43] 'Cause I knew that that was the last time
[02:23.71] The last time
[02:26.17] Sometimes I wake up by the door
[02:30.22] That heart you caught must be waiting for you
[02:35.03] Even now when we're already over
[02:39.33] I can't help myself from looking for you
[02:43.98] I set fire to the rain
[02:48.15] Watched it pour as I touch your face
[02:52.79] Well, it burned while I cried
[02:54.94] 'Cause I heard it screaming out your name
[02:59.60] Your name
[03:01.47] I set fire to the rain
[03:06.18] And I threw us into the flames
[03:10.58] When we fell, something died
[03:12.70] 'Cause I knew that that was the last time
[03:17.24] The last time, oh
[03:23.87] Oh, no
[03:28.16] Let it burn, oh-oh-oh
[03:36.86] Let it burn
[03:43.25] 
[03:45.91] Let it burn
[03:52.30]
